snippet.title: Let's Play The Final Fantasy Legend #01 - Road To Paradise
snippet.description:
Welcome to Let's Play The Final Fantasy Legend, aka Makai Toushi SaGa.  Being a side Let's Play series, I will not necessarily be uploading an episode every day.  Eventually, I plan on also doing FFL2-3, though possibly not immediately after this.

In this episode, I introduce the core mechanics of the game, and will go over the rest as they become relevant.  Also, I forgot to mention that while I start with two of the same monster, they will each be taking very different paths as I progress through the game.

Thanks for watching!
